headline: Meta Platforms, Inc. (META), Amazon.com, Inc. (AMZN), TJX (TJX) Touted by Longtime Pro Stock Picker
summary: Meta Platforms Inc. (META), Amazon (AMZN), and TJX (TJX) are all well-positioned to move “a lot higher in the next quarter,” Andrew Arons, the founder and Managing Partner of Synergy Advisory Management Group told Schwab Network recently. Meta’s Valuation Is Attractive As of last week, Meta’s valuation had reached its lowest point in almost a […]
